tweet.text: RT @PDD_PISM: We kicked off the 16th International Conference of Editors of Diplomatic Documents in Warsaw! During the two-day conference,…
tweet.html: RT @PDD_PISM: We kicked off the 16th International Conference of Editors of Diplomatic Documents in Warsaw! During the two-day conference, editors from all over the world will be discussing a great deal of issues concerning the history of diplomacy. @PISM_Poland
